Positive: The large ring protruding from the climbing hold would insure a very easily graspable object. Additionally the inner space has a large square which would provide the space needed for inner technology. In the middle of the hold there is an extra grabbable area that is designed for a more advanced climber due to its difficult grip, which in turn bordens the range of difficulty for my design.
Minus: Due to the complex structure of this climbing hold it would be time consuming and an inefficient process in forming the hold.
Improvement: Simplify the design to ensure an efficient construction time.
